description: This file defines a data transfer object (DTO) class 'RollRequest' used for representing a request to roll dice in the backend of a game, encapsulating a 'color' attribute with getter and setter methods.

classes.name: RollRequest
classes.description: A data transfer object representing a dice roll request with a color attribute.

methods.name: getColor
methods.description: Returns the color associated with this roll request.

methods.name: setColor
methods.description: Sets the color attribute of this roll request.
